title: Redeployment Customs Compliance
description: A logistics officer must ensure all equipment and personnel baggage being redeployed complies with customs regulations of the home country.

tasks.description: Generate customs declaration forms for all shipping containers of equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer accurately completes all required customs paperwork.

tasks.description: Brief all personnel on prohibited items they cannot bring back in their personal baggage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer effectively communicates the customs rules to all personnel.

tasks.description: Coordinate with customs officials to schedule inspections of the equipment and baggage upon arrival.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer successfully coordinates with external agencies to ensure a smooth customs process.
